title: Hour 1 – World Series Game 5, Kyrie Irving apologizes
itunes:title: Hour 1 – World Series Game 5, Kyrie Irving apologizes
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, Jason Smith and Mike Harmon recap TNF and Game 5 of the World Series.  Kyrie Irving gives a late-night apology and Jason hopes he means it when he says he wants to "learn and grow" from this situation. Plus, Jay Glazer drops in for all the latest from around the NFL! 

#jss

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
